titleStmt.title: At Edinburgh, the second day of January, one thousand six hundred and sixty two. The Lords of his Majesties Privy Council considering, that the late act of Parliament, entitled, Act for encouraging of shipping and navigation ...
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Evan Tyler, Printer to the Kings most excellent Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Royal arms at head of text; initial letter.
Signed at end: Pet. Wedderburne, Cl. Sti. Concilii.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
